node.text:
As one of Condé Nast Traveller’s 11 stunning wedding destinations of South India, The Raviz Kovalam is a heavenly choice indeed for memorable wedding celebrations. That one day where you and your beloved can feel like royalty, allow us to make it grand!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
